LITURGY.Comment: Always Pre-Sanctified for the Great Canon, except if it coincide with Annuncation

SAINT.Name: Thursday of the Great Canon of St Andrew

TROPARION.Header: Troparion of the Prophecy in the 6th Tone

SEXTE.TROPARION: O compassionate, long-suffering, almighty Lord, send down Thy mercy on Thy people.

PROKEIMENON.Header: First Prokeimenon of the Prophecy in the 6th Tone

SEXTE.STICHOS: Let the many islands be glad.

PROKEIMENON.Header: Second Prokeimenon of the Prophecy in the 6th Tone

SEXTE.PROKEIMENON: O sing unto the Lord a new song, for the Lord hath wrought wondrous things
SEXTE.STICHOS: All the ends of the earth have seen the salvation of our God.
